name: Dark Dead
description:
Dark Dead is a hardcore 2D action-platformer in which you have to fight an ancient evil and try to understand how and why you ended up in this place.

You wake up and don't remember anything.The only thing you have is your sword and the way forward...

In this game you will have to travel through a dark world in which you do not know how you ended up and to find out what happened to you, you will have
to overcome the enemies that will come across you along the way, but the closer to the final, the more difficult it will be to fight the enemies.Be careful or you can always stay here.

Key Features :

- Hardcore gameplay

- Nice pixel graphics that will immerse you in the atmosphere of this world.

- Unforgettable impressions
